thread.title: BRIEF-Canopy Growth Enters Into Supply Agreement With Yukon Liquor Corp

title: BRIEF-Canopy Growth Enters Into Supply Agreement With Yukon Liquor Corp
text:
10 AM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Canopy Growth Enters Into Supply Agreement With Yukon Liquor Corp Reuters Staff 
April 18 (Reuters) - Canopy Growth Corp: 
* CANOPY GROWTH CORPORATION ENTERS INTO SUPPLY AGREEMENT WITH THE YUKON LIQUOR CORPORATION 
* CANOPY GROWTH CORP - UNDER TERMS OF AGREEMENT, CANOPY GROWTH WILL SUPPLY YLC WITH UP TO 900 KG OF HIGH-QUALITY CANNABIS PRODUCT OVER NEXT THREE YEARS 
* CANOPY GROWTH CORP - SUPPLY AGREEMENT IS CONDITIONAL UPON FEDERAL AND PROVINCIAL GOVERNMENTS ADOPTING NECESSARY REGULATORY FRAMEWORK 
* CANOPY GROWTH CORP - ENTERED INTO AN AGREEMENT TO SUPPLY YUKON WITH CANNABIS PRODUCTS TO SERVE UPCOMING ADULT RETAIL MARKET Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
